name: Shopping Tour of Paris' rue des Martyrs
description: Located in the heart of Paris' 9eme arrondissement, rue des Martyrs is a favourite among the locals. Its proximity to South Pigalle and Montmartre make it one of the hippest areas to hang out in. Whether you want to shop the latest in bohemian fashion, find the quirkiest accessories as souvenirs, or sample great coffee and jams, this street has it all!
